content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 3, Juventus 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 3, Juventus 0.
Federico Bernardeschi (Juventus) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jordi Alba (Barcelona).
Offside, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Fabrizio Caligara (Juventus) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Fabrizio Caligara (Juventus).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Juventus. Fabrizio Caligara replaces Gonzalo Higuaín.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Alex Sandro.
Substitution, Barcelona. André Gomes replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Offside, Barcelona. Marc-André ter Stegen tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Federico Bernardeschi (Juventus) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Paulo Dybala.
Attempt blocked. Medhi Benatia (Juventus) header from very close range is blocked. Assisted by Federico Bernardeschi with a cross.
Corner,  Juventus. Conceded by Marc-André ter Stegen.
Attempt saved. Paulo Dybala (Juventus) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Stefano Sturaro.
Offside, Barcelona. Paulinho tries a through ball, but Jordi Alba is caught offside.
Substitution, Barcelona. Paulinho replaces Ivan Rakitic.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Stefano Sturaro (Juventus).
Attempt saved. Federico Bernardeschi (Juventus) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Paulo Dybala.
Miralem Pjanic (Juventus) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Miralem Pjanic (Juventus).
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Paulo Dybala (Juventus) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto replaces Ousmane Dembélé.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Juventus 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta following a fast break.
Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Blaise Matuidi (Juventus).
Paulo Dybala (Juventus) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Federico Bernardeschi (Juventus) left footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Juventus. Conceded by Nélson Semedo.
Substitution, Juventus. Federico Bernardeschi replaces Rodrigo Bentancur.
Stefano Sturaro (Juventus) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Gianluigi Buffon.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner.
Andrea Barzagli (Juventus) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Andrea Barzagli (Juventus).

Nélson Semedo (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Juventus 0. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Miralem Pjanic (Juventus).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) hits the right post with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Attempt missed. Paulo Dybala (Juventus) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.
Second Half begins Barcelona 1, Juventus 0.
First Half ends, Barcelona 1, Juventus 0.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Juventus 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
